verses.verse: And it came to pass, when <S%H120>men<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H7231>multiply<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>, and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> unto them,

That the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%> that <S%H2007>they<s%> were <S%H2896>fair<s%>; and they <S%H3947>took<s%> them <S%H802>wives<s%> of all which they <S%H977>chose<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall not <S%H5769>always<s%> <S%H1777>strive<s%> with <S%H120>man<s%>, for that he <S%H1571>also<s%> is <S%H1320%H7683>flesh<s%>: yet his <S%H3117>days<s%> shall be an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>.

There were <S%H5303>giants<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> in those <S%H3117>days<s%>; and also <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H3651>that<s%>, <S%H834>when<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> came <S%H935>in<s%> unto the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>, and they <S%H3205>bare<s%> children to them, the <S%H1992>same<s%> became mighty <S%H1368>men<s%> which were of <S%H5769>old<s%>, <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H8034>renown<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3068>GOD<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H7451>wickedness<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H7227>great<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and that every <S%H3336>imagination<s%> of the <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart<s%> was <S%H7535>only<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>continually<s%>.
And it <S%H5162>repented<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> that he had <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> on the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and it <S%H6087>grieved<s%> him <S%H413>at<s%> his <S%H3820>heart<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, I will <S%H4229>destroy<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> whom I have <S%H1254>created<s%> from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>; both <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H5704>and<s%> <S%H929>beast<s%>, and the creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%>, and the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of the <S%H8064>air<s%>; for it <S%H5162>repenteth<s%> me that I have <S%H6213>made<s%> them.
But <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

¶ These are the <S%H8435>generations<s%> of <S%H5146>Noah<s%>: <S%H5146>Noah<s%> was a <S%H6662>just<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in his <S%H1755>generations<s%>, and <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H1980>walked<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>.
And <S%H5146>Noah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%>, <S%H8035>Shem<s%>, <S%H2526>Ham<s%>, and <S%H3315>Japheth<s%>.
The <S%H776>earth<s%> also was <S%H7843>corrupt<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%>, and the <S%H776>earth<s%> was <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2555>violence<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and, behold, it was <S%H7843>corrupt<s%>; for all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> had <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> his <S%H1870>way<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H5146>Noah<s%>, The <S%H7093>end<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H935>come<s%> before <S%H6440>me<s%>; for the <S%H776>earth<s%> is filled <S%H4390>with<s%> <S%H2555>violence<s%> through <S%H6440>them<s%>; and, behold, I will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> them <S%H854>with<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>.

¶ <S%H6213>Make<s%> thee an <S%H8392>ark<s%> of <S%H1613>gopher<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%>; <S%H7064>rooms<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H854>in<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, and shalt <S%H3722>pitch<s%> it <S%H1004>within<s%> and <S%H2351>without<s%> with <S%H3724>pitch<s%>.

And this is the fashion which thou shalt <S%H6213>make<s%> it of: The <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> shall be <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of it <S%H2572>fifty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>, and the <S%H6967>height<s%> of it <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%>.

A <S%H6672>window<s%> shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> to the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, and in a <S%H520>cubit<s%> shalt thou <S%H3615>finish<s%> it <S%H4605>above<s%>; and the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H8392>ark<s%> shalt thou <S%H7760>set<s%> in the side <S%H6654>thereof<s%>; with <S%H8482>lower<s%>, <S%H8145>second<s%>, and <S%H7992>third<s%> stories shalt thou <S%H6213>make<s%> it.

And, <S%H2009>behold<s%>, <S%H589>I<s%>, even I, do <S%H935>bring<s%> a <S%H3999>flood<s%> of <S%H4325>waters<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, wherein is the <S%H7307>breath<s%> of <S%H2416>life<s%>, from <S%H8478>under<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%>; and every <S%H3605>thing<s%> that is in the <S%H776>earth<s%> shall <S%H1478>die<s%>.

But with thee will I <S%H6965>establish<s%> my <S%H1285>covenant<s%>; and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, <S%H859>thou<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and thy <S%H802>wife<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%> with thee.

And of every living <S%H2416>thing<s%> of all <S%H1320>flesh<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> of every sort shalt thou <S%H935>bring<s%> into the <S%H8392>ark<s%>, to keep them <S%H2421>alive<s%> with thee; they shall be <S%H2145>male<s%> and <S%H5347>female<s%>.

Of <S%H5775>fowls<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>, and of <S%H929>cattle<s%> after their <S%H4327>kind<s%>, of every creeping <S%H7431>thing<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%> after his <S%H4327>kind<s%>, <S%H8147>two<s%> of every sort shall <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, to keep them <S%H2421>alive<s%>.
And <S%H3947>take<s%> thou unto thee of all <S%H3978>food<s%> that is <S%H398>eaten<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H622>gather<s%> it to thee; and it shall be for <S%H402>food<s%> for thee, and for them.
Thus <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H5146>Noah<s%>; according to all that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him, so <S%H6213>did<s%> he.
